column1: Description: Poverty surveys collect data on household income, consumption and expenditure, including income in kind. They typically include income, expenditure, and consumption surveys, household budget surveys, Integrated Surveys, Living Standard Measuring Surveys, and other poverty related surveys
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
It is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license.
More information on licensing is available here: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
